attributes.action: Abolish ALL plans for the National Identity Register completely. (with response)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The majority of people I converse with tell me they do not want this ID Card... I agree with them. We are unconvinced that the life of even one person will be saved by the introduction of this identity card system. In fact, we argue that MANY people will in effect become 'AT RISK' with so much personal information accessible by 330,000 civil servants (the same civil servants who seem to be pretty good at losing our personal data). Abolish any plans NOW.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
